title: Replacing sitting time with physical activity associated with lower risk of death

title_detail.value: Replacing sitting time with physical activity associated with lower risk of death

summary: For those who get the least amount of physical activity, replacing a half hour of sitting time with physical activity was associated with up to a nearly 50 percent reduction in mortality, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: For those who get the least amount of physical activity, replacing a half hour of sitting time with physical activity was associated with up to a nearly 50 percent reduction in mortality, according to a new study.
